duties_responsibilities.duty: Accurately perform gas engine layouts and produce detailed drawings for manufacturing or supply chain.
Develop bills of material and 3D solid models of gas engine components or systems.
Create P&IDs for associated engine systems and engineering drawings for manufacturing and supply chain.
Support product design and development, part detailing and checking, and fabrication and manufacturing.
Incorporate new designs and standards into existing gas engine designs while staying within footprint limitations.
Assist in design reviews and implement design changes.
Demonstrate problem-solving skills and innovative thinking.

education_certification.credential: 2 year Associates Degree or Technical Diploma in Drafting (those with more experience may be considered for a more senior level)
